title: Salem Witch Trials - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 10/22/21
itunes:title: Salem Witch Trials - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 10/22/21
description:
Guest host Ian Punnett and professor Paul DeBole explore his research into the Salem Witch Trials, when early American settlers persecuted their fellow villagers for allegedly practicing witchcraft, and whether simple rumors led to the deaths of the young female victims.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
